wikipedia_page.main: George Brander Sime (28 February 1915 – 9 September 1990) was a British and Scottish international field hockey player who competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics.He was a member and captain of the British field hockey team that won the silver medal. He played all five matches as halfback.
